hypothesis_content.title: BTC Dominance Reversal on Multi-Asset News Flow
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC dominance (BTC market cap/total crypto market cap) reaches extreme levels (>55% or <48%) during periods of multi-asset crypto news (like S&P index or Grayscale fund), dominance will reverse toward 51.5% within 3 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Multi-asset news flows encourage capital rotation between BTC and alts. Extreme dominance levels during such news represent overreactions. The 51.5% level represents recent equilibrium in NEUTRAL regimes.
entry_conditions: Multi-asset crypto news within past 48 hours (index launches, fund announcements)
ETH/BTC pair shows opposite momentum to dominance extreme

exit_conditions.take_profit: Dominance returns to 51.5% ± 1% or position reaches ±4% return
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Dominance moves further 2% beyond entry extreme

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Dominance remains beyond 53-50% band for >5 days following qualifying news events
